attributes.action: Allow the transmission of hardcore pornography on television by paid subscription.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adults should be allowed to subscribe to hardcore pornographic tv channels as a matter of personal choice. In doing so the government would be seen to take a more enlightened and grown-up attitude towards sexual entertainment for adults. The current softcore tv channels are inadequate and fall short of what responsible adults want to be able to see.
